Is there a question in there? If so, I can't seem to find it.

Nope, it doesn't really matter anymore, I can't launch KSP...
The community would be able to help you more effectively if your support question was stated in the original post, rather than hinted at cryptically.

The community would be able to help you more effectively if your support question was stated in the original post, rather than hinted at cryptically.

Not really a question. I figured I'd want to mention that I was about to cause KSP to virtually (And realistically) implode, not that it matters anymore, KSP decided to die because of my twenty two mods (Memory issue, I just have to uninstall some mods, which I can do)

Thanks for trying to help.

Edit: Welp, I just learned the hard way that it's not going to work (Yes I tried to launch it, The Kraken ate me).

LEARN FROM ME.

Edited May 23, 2014 by Special Agent Sigvan
O.o I don't know what this thread is about. Pretty sure I've learned...whatever it is I'm supposed to have learned. I use LoD.
You're missing active texture management. First try basic, if that doesn't work use aggressive.
